column2: but I don't hate it. It's just okay. I come here when my friends want to go
column3: but I go to Iberico if I'm planning. The service is usually snooty and the food isn't really worth the price
column4: in my opinion. I think it's ironic that the "crispy calamari" are not really crispy at all. The rest of the food I've had
column6: has been decent. One of my friends keeps trying to tell me that the patatas bravas make up for everything else that the restaurant is lacking
column7: so they are on my list to try. Maybe I'll change my mind?
